body_html:
are you running the code from command line? try to run from command line.
add the following in your system include path.

export PATH=/usr/local/cuda/bin:$PATH
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/usr/local/cuda/lib64"
export CUDA_HOME=/usr/local/cuda

body:
are you running the code from command line? try to run from command line. 
add the following in your system include path.

export PATH=/usr/local/cuda/bin:$PATH
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/usr/local/cuda/lib64"
export CUDA_HOME=/usr/local/cuda
